data.text: @Paul__Jones @NBATVCanada @OpenGymRaptors Quality stuff on @OpenGymRaptors ... but the coverage from TSN/Sportsnet on the Raptors is stale, commentary is stale, graphics are stale ... pre and post game coverage is all the same ... it has been the same for the past 4-5 years ... would love some different voices

@Paul__Jones @OpenGymRaptors When I you guys in my wife says ‘Not these two again...’ Don’t knock Joney and Sherm but I also agree that the show could you use some new flow or some new content to spice it up. My 2 cents. Thanks for reading

@Paul__Jones @OpenGymRaptors You guys have great inside access, and yes, you work for the Raptors so hands are somewhat tied, but that access to let us understand XOs of practice, etc, would be great. Just feel like show needs a refresh.

@Paul__Jones @OpenGymRaptors For sure Jonesy..and thanks for the response. There was a tweet that came out from NBATV Canada that made it seem like because of ESPN All Access, that Raptors Today would somehow be different than normal, hence my comment.
